channel.title: Admin/mod/creator help
channel.description: i downloaded a server, andd i wanted to know how to edit to make me creator and make mods,admins,etc.

item.title: Admin/mod/creator help
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

ok u wanna download the server of ur choice(im usin evilscape and a few others) and if u want edit w/e and compile it. Then move hybridspace to ur desktop and replace it wit the server ur usin.So in
C:\Program Files\MoparScape
id have a folder name Evilscape
now in
C:\Program Files\MoparScape\Whateverserveryouareusing
and ur gonna want to find a file
runserver.bat
and after u run it its gonna give u Ip-address and port
put em in and ur playin!
now i dont think that server lets u do more than 1 person, but more personal. If u want to do a multiplayer one go see the Server Tutorial by that mod to set up a multiplayer server

Read full topic

item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

go to chracter list in your character folder then there should be a player rights thing and then = 0 change it to 3 if your creator…2=mod 1=idk 0=player

item.title: Admin/mod/creator help
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

That’s it. Change the if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) to your username, also change the if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod darren")) playerRights = 3;*/
to your username then run it. Your account will be Owner.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2007, 02:23:02 PM[/size][hr]Anyways, School is about to get out and I won’t get home till later. If you have any other questions, just send me a PM and I’ll answer it once I get home. =)

Read full topic

item.title: Admin/mod/creator help
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

this part of code?
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

/checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Ryan”))
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod darren”))
playerRights = 3;/

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod roscoe"))
			{
				playerRights = 1; 
			}

and if so where?

Read full topic

item.title: Admin/mod/creator help
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

Open the client.java (The client text file) and search for admin. Search for it a couple of times, till you see something that says something along the lines of mod 1 admin 2 (I can’t remember exactly, I’m at school)

Then take out one of the usernames and replace it with yours.

playerRights 3 is Owner
playerRights 2 is Admin
playerRights 1 is Mod

Read full topic
